```{r global_options, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width=12, fig.height=8, fig.path='images/',
                      echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, eval=TRUE)
```

```{r sourcing}

load("data/flood_metadata.RData")
load("data/flood_data.RData")
source("global.R")

q50 <- median(na.omit(flood_metadata$record_length))
q25 <- quantile(na.omit(flood_metadata$record_length), 0.25)
q75 <- quantile(na.omit(flood_metadata$record_length), 0.75)

st_selection_1 <- which(flood_metadata$record_length < q25)
st_selection_2 <- which(flood_metadata$record_length < q50)
st_selection_3 <- which(flood_metadata$record_length < q75)
st_selection_4 <- seq(along = flood_metadata$record_length)
```

## QS

#### QS 2y

```{r QS_2y_record_length_q25q50q75,  results = "asis", fig.height= 10, fig.width= 15, fig.keep = "all", fig.align='center'}
gof_type <- "QS"
returnPeriod <- 2

plot4server_rlevels_coeffvar_ave(gof_type, returnPeriod,30,150, st_selection_1)
plot4server_rlevels_coeffvar_ave(gof_type, returnPeriod,30,150, st_selection_2)
plot4server_rlevels_coeffvar_ave(gof_type, returnPeriod,30,150, st_selection_3)
plot4server_rlevels_coeffvar_ave(gof_type, returnPeriod,30,150, st_selection_4)
```

#### QS 10y

